## Data acquisition and assessment

#### Data sources

The data sources are from United States Department of Agriculture Statistics Service(USAS) National Agricultural Statistics Service(NASS).

#### Assumptions and motivations

Even though the strawberry contains chemical compounds that might help reduce the risk of getting cancer, whether the strawberry is healthy to people still need to be decided. Some articles believe that strawberries may not be safe because the pesticides using of them are potentially toxic and may have negative effect of reproduction, and the presticides cannot be fully remove after washing.
